metadata.title: Penguins are funny birds
metadata.description: Find out about these amazing animals that live in the harshest climate on Earth.

toc.title: Imagine being a crew member, hundreds of years ago. You are sailing in southern waters. Your captain is searching for food while exploring new waters. Your job is to watch the sea off the ship’s side for ice. You help the ship’s pilot to avoid a wreck. White, floating ice in a dark-blue ocean stretches as far as you can see. Cold wind blows on your face. A fish darts past, beside the ship. Another slows to a stop. It raises its head above the water to look at you. How could a fish do that?
​A penguin "flies" out of the water onto the snow and ice.
